org.ldaptive.io

Class LdifWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ldaptive.io.LdifWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SearchResultWriter

    public class LdifWriter
extends Object
implements SearchResultWriter
    Writes a SearchResult as LDIF to a Writer.
